alert.note: Alert for Washington (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washington, northwestern Pierce and southwestern St. Croix Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Hudson, or 12 miles northwest of River Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hudson around 235 PM CDT. Roberts around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include River Falls. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
